channel.title: Dementhium Unspawnables?

item.title: Dementhium Unspawnables?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

How would I make an item unspawnable
Item code:

if (command[0].equals("item")) { if(player.refreshAttackOptions()) { player.sendMessage("You can't spawn inside the wilderness! Go to ::atele home or somewhere else outside of the wildy"); player.sendMessage("To be able to spawn!"); return; }

Read full topic
